products.title: FRAGMENT-SWEATSHIRT-FOREST
products.description:
# Where the old breaks — and the new begins.
Fragments is a study of transformation.
Each piece carries the geometry of broken shapes — symbols of the battles you've faced, the limits you've cracked, and the strength you’ve rebuilt.

## Features:
• 100% premium cotton — 320g
• High-grade Turkish craftsmanship
• Soft, breathable & durable
• Reinforced neckline
• Relaxed fit for everyday motion

products.title: ESSENCE-SWEATSHIRT
products.description:
# Essence of Focus. Built for the Ones Who Move in Silence.
A deep black built for the focused — the ones who stay sharp when the world gets loud.

## Features:
• 100% premium cotton — 320g
• High-grade Turkish craftsmanship
• Soft, breathable & durable
• Reinforced neckline
• Relaxed fit for everyday motion
